body.en:
20/08 Release Brief

 

The 20/08 release is packed with new, innovative topics and is marking a major milestone in our product portfolio: The official release of the Commerce solution is completing our Three-in-One architecture with support for aftersales processes on a single platform.

What are the BENEFITS of the Manufacturing X Release 20/08

Reached unmatched Sales Efficiency and ensure always up-to-date CRM data with our new Email & Calendar Integration.

Capture more accurate product information with our Product and Product Catalog enhancement.

Our new ‘MX Commerce’ enables you to offer a unique after-sales experience. Let your customers browse your product catalog or order the right spare parts within seconds.

title.en: What is new in our 20/08 Release?

body.en:
Features at a glance

Commerce*

  • Branding, Theming, Banners, etc.
  • Browse Portal Product Catalog
  • View ‘my equipment’ with Spare Part BOM from ERP
  • Product Information
  • Cart and Checkout Management
  • Order History and Re-Order
  • User Provisioning and Authentication Rules

 

CRM

  • Manage Emails, incl. Office 365 Integration*
  • Manage Meetings & Calendar*
  • Improved Sales Cockpit

 

CPQ

  • Improved Account Team & Party Roles incl. Employees
  • Improved Catalog with Regional Availability for Sales Area
  • Improved Product Category Hierarchy
  • Improved Product Images and Descriptions

 

MX Core Services

  • Equipment Replication with Serial Numbers Improved Access Rights Management

title.en: With Release 20/08 we launch Manufacturing X Commerce

body.en:
What are the BENEFITS?

Our flexible and industry specific commerce solutions allows you to go live in weeks rather than months, resulting in quick time-to-value, high user involvement and unmatched ROI.

Capture additional revenue streams by providing a state-of-the-art buying experience to your customers for aftersales and offer an intuitive way to your customers to find the correct spare parts and consumables.

Extend your digital sales process and produce new digital experiences that will lead to a better customer experience and customer loyalty.

B2B Commerce Core Processes:

  • Branding and theming capabilities
  • Sales area based product catalog
  • Browse product categories such as consumables and spare part catalog
  • View serialized equipment and find the matching parts
  • ERP Pricing with real-time capabilities
  • Manage Cart and Check-out
  • Order process including order history, reordering and approval-workflow

Create an engaging shopping experience. Present your brand narrative easily with simple content creation tools that enable you to provide a best-in-class shopping experience in minutes and without any need for developer support. Select color schemes, logos, header and footer content to communicate your core values and unique selling propositions.

Benefits

  • Present your brand and messaging in a very easy way, go-live in weeks rather than months

Features

  • Upload logos and icons
  • Select corporate colors
  • Define promotional banners § Define header categories
  • Define footer
  • Add social media links

Additional Notes

  • This feature requires MX Commerce license
  • Optional: configuration of ERP replication of Product Category hierarchy

Finding the right product quickly is even more critical for spare parts since this is the time when your customer’s experience is most vulnerable. MX Commerce gives your customer the convenient and unique ability to browse and filter his own equipment, or search by serial number. From there he can pick exactly the right spare parts that match the configured options of his original product. This functionality is powered by replication of Equipments and thier Maintenance BOM from ERP or Excel Upload.

Benefits

  • As a data platform the same product definition is available for direct, channel, and commerce
  • Sales area based access to ensure you have channel specific price and visibility 
  • Easy order and re-order

Features

  • Search Product with type-ahead search
  • Browse from product categories from (ERP) Product Category Hierarchy as entry points
  • Secure access through filter by Sales Area and applicability for online sales
  • Faceted search to filter catalog quickly
  • Display main product image, name and material number
  • Show list price from ERP and calculated product discount for which the customer is eligible to
     

Additional Notes

  • This feature requires MX Commerce license

Finding the right product quickly is even more critical for spare parts since this is the time when your customer’s experience is most vulnerable. MX Commerce gives your customer the convenient and unique ability to browse and filter his own equipment, or search by serial number. From there he can pick exactly the right spare parts that match the configured options of his original product. This functionality is powered by replication of Equipments and thier Maintenance BOM from ERP or Excel Upload.

 

Benefits

  • High customer satisfaction through quick and easy self-service order for spare parts with order history and favorites

Features

  • Search by serial number of equipment

  • Browse and filter equipment by product, shipping address or purchase date

  • Explore available spare parts filtered by applicable to selected equipment

  • ERP Replication of Equipment and maintenance BOM or Excel Upload

Additional Notes

  • This feature requires MX Commerce license
  • To configure, turn on Equipment sync under Data Management or ERP Synchronization

Display your products as they deserves to be shown. Give your customer all required information such as images, formatted texts with tables, inline images and videos. Additionally you can release selected documents for consumption in your MX Commerce portal. Point your customers to related products to leverage additional up- or cross-sell opportunities.

Benefits

  • Supply your customer with rich content – from images over description and specification to videos and documentations

Features

  • Instantly make your products available for MX Commerce
  • Fully HTML formatted texts (entered via editor)
  • Multiple images replicated from ERP or uploaded manually
  • Restrict images/attachments for commerce
  • Manage attachments and display technical drawings, specifications, user manuals or how-to-guides
  • Display list price and eligible discounts
  • Mark products as favorites for easy product look-up
  • Display Related Products, in "You may also like" section
     
 

Additional Notes

  • This feature requires MX Commerce license
  • For ERP replication the sync needs to be enabled and a full load is required

Fast and instant order creation. Allow your customer to serve himself, fast and reliable, with a 100% correct pricing, eligible discounts and flawless order entry right into your ERP with the selected bill-to and ship-to addresses from his ERP Account records.

Benefits

  • Fast and instant self-service order creation

     

Features

  • Shopping Cart
  • Order Review
  • Select from associated bill- and ship-to information
  • Line and order level pricing with ERP pricing capabilities
  • Configurable pricing summary to include discounts, taxes, shipping and other costs
  • Self-service Order with PO Number
     
 

Additional Notes

  • This feature requires MX Commerce license
  • ERP Pricing Configuration for Commerce required

See all your order information at a glance including order number, PO number, date, amount and status. Quickly re-order within seconds or create a new shopping cart and modify based on your current needs. Re-ordering was never easier.

Benefits

  • Re-order with one click
  • Enable order placement approvals by managing orders placed by others with the ability to reject or amend orders.

Features

  • See my order history at a glace
  • Review own orders and orders placed by others (admin functionality)
  • Re-order with one click from historical orders
  • Add products from previous orders to current shopping cart

Additional Notes

  • This feature requires MX Commerce license

Easily provision portal users for your customers. Give your account contacts access to the MX Commerce portal within a few clicks. Enable the responsible sales area to give access to the regional product catalogs and ensure correct order processing.

Benefits

  • Easy and integrated user provisioning as per your CRM and ERP records

Features

  • Provision user simply based on accounts / customer contacts
  • Pre-delivered roles to designate portal admins, sales / business admins and portal users
  • Account / Customer-based security
  • Sales area based product access to ensure adequate data access

Additional Notes

  • This feature requires MX Commerce license

What are the BENEFITS?

100% accurate and up-to-date customer data in one concise live record to drive customer satisfaction and deal closures.

Automate, simplify and accelerate the full lead-to-order process across regions and departments to reduce cost of sales.

Gain valuable analytics insights via actionable dashboards to prioritize opportunities and focus on most profitable deals.

Email and phone are the sales rep’s main tools when he is not with a customer. Accessing account and contact data as well as latest opportunity and quote information right in his work environment boosts efficiency tremendously. Also it helps to keep CRM records up-to-date, by storing email contents, attachments and the like to the corresponding account and contact

 

Benefits

  • Gain efficiency in your daily customer conversations
  • Ensure transparency on the state of each engagement across the organization
  • Keep the full history on each engagement together with all relevant documents

Features

  • Review all relevant contact and account information right in your email client
  • Direct access to current pipeline and quotations stored in Manufacturing X
  • Store email contents (including attachments) in Manufacturing X linked to account, opportunity or quote
  • Synced Objects: Contacts, Account, E-mails, Attachments

Additional Notes 

  • MS Exchange versions: Microsoft Exchange 2010, 2013, 2016 and Microsoft Office 365 are supported for synchronization.
  • Outlook Add-In is supported on Exchange 2013 or later

Outlook dictates a sales representative's daily routines. Scheduling tasks, reminders and meetings from CRM makes sure that your account strategy is executed flawlessly. Ensure that you never miss a task, to-do or meeting again and schedule them right from your Manufacturing X CRM.

Benefits

  • Execute account strategy and sales cycles flawlessly
  • Ensure everybody is aware of all tasks, meetings and to-do and receives reminders in Outlook

Features

  • Create Meetings and Tasks in Manufacturing X CRM
  • Synchronize Meetings and Tasks to Outlook
  • View Tasks in CRM as Gantt Charts if assigned to Account, Opportunity or Quote
  • Synced Objects: Tasks, Meetings

Additional Notes 

  • MS Exchange versions: Microsoft Exchange 2010, 2013, 2016 and Microsoft Office 365 are supported for synchronization.
  • Outlook Add-In is supported on Exchange 2013 or later

Outlook dictates a sales representative's daily routines. Scheduling tasks, reminders and meetings from CRM makes sure that your account strategy is executed flawlessly. Ensure that you never miss a task, to-do or meeting again and schedule them right from your Manufacturing X CRM.

Benefits

  • Increased performance of homepage due to caching of widgets
  • Optimized UI/UX to leverage real estate as much as possible

Features

  • Floating Refresh and Change Icons for Homepage
  • Homepage content shifted to the very top
  • Optimized icons in the application bar

Additional Notes 

  • Role-based Sales Cockpit can be easily configured per role

What are the BENEFITS?

Always match your customers’ needs – zero errors in configuration, costing, pricing and orders.

Accelerate your manufacturing sales to deliver made-to-win quotes on point with tight manufacturing backend integration.

Grow digital buying and collaboration channels to beat your competition.

title.en: CPQ: Improved Party Roles incl. Employees

body.en:
In 20/08 Employee is now a standalone concept in Manufacturing X. A partner function now has a flag to indicate the main person in that function. With this it is possible to name the owner for a certain function easily. This simplifies the authorization for complicated sales organizations. You can now also replicate all employees, maintain them in their respective roles/functions and assign a user easily.

Benefits

  • Replicate all employees and easily assign users
  • Ensure that all functions on Account, Opportunity and Quote are known and that responsibilities are clear
  • Easily define access rights based on function and ownership

Features

  • Define role/function per employee
  • User assignment based on employees
  • On account, Opportunity and Quote define the
    main employee for a certain role/ function

Additional Notes 

  • Post upgrade, employees will be created for existing users. Additional employees can be maintained
  • Requires definition of function to assign Account Party Roles automatically to Opportunity or Quote or manual maintenance of the same

title.en: CPQ: Product Catalogue per Sales Area

body.en:
The regional availability of products has been improved. While the Product Catalogue restrictions was available per Sales Team and Sales Office to serve complex sales teams' structures, you can now also restrict which products are available for different Sales Areas (Division, Distribution Channel, Sales Organization) via replication from ERP or manually and whether they are exposed to the Commerce Portal.

Benefits

  • As a data platform the same product definition is available for direct, channel, and commerce
  • Sales area based access to ensure you have channel specific price and visibility

Features

  • Sales Area can now be maintained directly on the product header and is fully integrated w/ ERP
  • Access rules to restrict based on Sales Area of the user
  • Excel upload/download enhanced with category, division, classification, restrict data points for easy maintenance

Additional Notes 

  • Replication or maintenance of Sales Area required on product

To further support additional use cases the product category received a dramatic overhaul: now a true hierarchy, product categories can be managed via a hierarchy view in MX or can be fully integrated with ERP. Images can be maintained as well. In addition certain hierarchy levels can be restricted to avoid a product assignment.

Benefits

  • Provide a guided navigation via category hierarchy

Features

  • Define locally or replicate from ERP
  • Maintain hierarchy of categories

The product in MX plays a key role: available across all applications (CRM, CPQ and Commerce), the product received numerous updates: Rich text for marketing description supporting formatted text, embed images, video links.

Benefits

  • Making sure your product is represented as it deserves, using images and formatted text and for commerce even embedded videos

Features

  • Replicate product images from ERP
  • Flag Main Product image
  • Classify attachment type as product images, specifications, spare part manuals etc.
  • Product search now supports ‘Category’ field

What are the BENEFITS?

One integral data model and service layer across CRM, CPQ and Commerce allow deep insights and lowest cost-of-ownership with no integration required.

Manufacturing X empowers you to simplify your entire sales process and guarantees highest agility and maximum adoption for every sales situation.

The extensibility concept leverages Low-Code or No-Code Extensions, and Open APIs, allowing you to quickly adapt Manufacturing X to your needs.

Equipment data in MX provides the insight of the equipment that customers have already installed at sites, e.g. address, status, validity, its components and supporting documents. It equips sales representatives with a better understanding of customers’ current state for more upsell and cross-sell opportunities. In Commerce context, the data is used to help customers to easily identity the right consumables and spare parts based on the installed equipment.

Benefits

  • Provide insights of equipment installed at customer sites across all channels
  • Allow admin to maintain and validate equipment master data easily through Manufacturing X UI

Features

  • Automatically sync master data from ERP
  • Allow deletion and edit
  • Multiple equipment screens: Equipment under Account, Equipment Listing and Equipment Detail screen including multiple taps (Overview, Sub Equipment, BOM, Partners, Sales Info and Attachment)
  • Rich data points, e.g. ID, description, product, serial number, category, status, linked parent ID, linked BOM, partners, address, attachment and sales area
  • Pre-delivered Saved search: All Equipment, My Favorite Equipment, Main Equipment

Additional Notes 

  • Turn on Equipment replication under Data Management or ERP Synchronization

Contacts now have a sales area, so that you can have additional security rules, to only access products in sales area. Also the Currency is defaulted based on Main Sales Area to give a smoother checkout experience. The core user & role management is used to ensure only allowed data and actions are available using read restriction and permission defined in business role for Portal Business Admin & Portal End Users

Benefits

  • Sales Info on contacts, helps reduce data entry when creating order
  • Ensure the right products & price is seen in the catalog based on sales area
  • Business roles controls data and actions

Features

  • Maintain Sales area on contact based on available values on account
  • Mark one of them as default
